note.p: Birth: Spring Hill, near Birmingham, Warwickshire, England (02 July 1822 or 02 July 1823)
Death: His town house, 11 Chester Street, London (10 or 18 March 1899)
Career: Captain, Royal Engineers; Secretary to the Railway Department, Board of Trade.
Notes: BR gives birth and death dates as 2 July 1823 and 10 March 1899. There is some doubt as to which county Spring Hill is in.
